1111.content:
you are mike, the guy who would be considered the passionate guy that sticks out in a drama class but is just another face in the crowd. you have a very soft side which makes you get despised by the more popular people and appreciated by the other kinds of people at school, mostly the bookish girls and you are very nice to them. sadly, you also do carry a short fuse that a some point burns up, making you unleash allot of rage, but that makes you earn some respect from people who would believe they have better thing to do than talk to you. you are clever and smart but you never get a good chance to show it.

it was just another day for you to go to school but this day would change your life permanently.

that day you did your usual routine and everything was just as it was until 5th period history and you ran into your crush, stephenie. as soon as you see her you just freeze up and muster a "hi", she smiles back at you and says hi back then you head to your seat.
class was all the same and every chance you get that dosnt seem creepy, you try to look at her and every time you do, she smiles back at you, leaving your heart racing.

after school, you took the bus. and after the horrible 15 minutes there, you were home but something didnt feel right. it seemed like something was following you but you just shook it off and went into your house.

when you got into your house, it seemed hotter than usual, so you checked the thermostat and it read 76 degrees. you wondered why it seemed so hot in there, but you ignored it and turned on the fan then began watching TV but it wasnt long before you felt even hotter than you did earlier. you then got another fan but that didnt work and at that point, it only took 5 minutes before you passed out from heat stroke.

while you were unconsciouss, you saw that you were in mid-air but all around you were flames and while there, you heard a voice saying, "the world needs your help and you shall be blessed with the honor of being at one with fire." then almost as fast as you ended up there, you were back in your house and the heat passed but there was one difference: your clothes are chared and have holes in them. "was that really a dream?" you wondered, so you decided to go to your backyard to test it out but before you got outside, you felt something very hot on your shoulder. you turned around to look and it turns out there was something that resembles a golem behind you that had flames on it an lava veins, it also stood nearly 2 feet taller than you.

after the inital shock, you tried to free yourself from the golem's grasp but all it did was make the golem angry, so it tightened its grip on you, which broke your shoulder then it tossed you back and your back hit the wall with allot of force, causing you to lose all of your breath. the golem then charged at you but even with all the pain that you had you managed to get out of the way with juping, but when you jumped, it seemed it took alot less to do that. when you stuck the landing, you tied to shoot a ball of fire at the golem, which you suceeded at, causing it to be blown back. when it got back up, it charged at you again, but this time, it turned both it's arms into a long spear. you tied to create a shield of fire, but instead, you shot a solid blade of fire at the golem, making it's spear to be split back into arms but what seemed to be a glowing red rock, you grineed and saw what that meant. when you jumped out of the way, you pulled in so much flame that could make a basket ball then turned it into a spear. when the golem turned to you, you shot the spear at it's head; unfotunatly, it lifted it's arm to block the spear, but thankfully you put enough power behind that it destroyed the golem's right arm. after seeing what you did, you shot 4 balls of flame at the golem, which exploded, causing the golem to be blown back with no armor on it's chest. you kept up the shots and the dodging, but the golem also got some good shots at you, leaving you with a broken leg and arm, a near fractured rib, and severe cuts on your face, along with multiple burn marks. you managed to remove all armor from the glom, but with its lava body exposed, this started to burn your house. it was time to end this so you ran right at it with fire over your arm to protect you from the burn. you then made a flame sphere around your hand and made it expand until the golem exploded.

after the battle, you used your powers to clean up, nothing to do about the broken furniture. you yelled out-loud,"ok, what the heck is going on here, where ar my parents" in the hope that the voice who gave you your powers would hear you, which it did but it was a vision of a beutiful woman who wore a silver, flowing dress. "you were chosen to be one of very few who shall defend the world from an impending threat. you must leave your home behind and begin to search for others who may posses the powers of the attributes." you looked at her in shock and asked her," but what about my parents? where are they and wont they worry about me?" she looked at you with a look of sadness and replied,"your parents have been banished to where this threat is from, they may not even be alive but if they are, then you must set out to rescue them" this gave you a sudden schock of hatred and sadness and thats where the vision faded with the woman telling you, "its up to you to save us" you are then left in the house alone with major injuries and no clue where to start. you decided it would be best to check on your sister: sam, she was at her swim meet and you two were very close, if you had to leave your life forever, you had to bring her along. before you left, you grabed the emegency money, check books, and credit cards your parents kept around but you stumbled on them one night you were sleep walking.

when you get everything that you needed, you headed off to the public pool to get your sister and when you got there
1111.title: bringing the flames

11111.content:
when you got to the public pool and saw water everywhere, some of it frozen and the diving boards fell over the stands along with there being slight flames where the score board is. "what happened here?" you wondered while entering.

after further inspection, you saw that there was blood on some parts of the floor and this made you worry cause other than stephenie and your parents, your sister was was the most important person to you and if anything happened to her, you wouldnt know what to do or even forgive yourself.
"hey sam, are you here? it's me: mike. if your ok then give me a sing." you called out which, luckily to you, was heard loud and clear so sam emerged from under the undamaged area of the stands with a limp and cuts allover her body, while holding her arm, she also seemed to have been slightly caughing.

"hey, it's great to see you, i thought they got you." she replied but that sentence seemed to hav confused you so you asked, "who, and what happened here?" she smiled at you warmly but it quickly faded when she was about to tell you."well, to start, i just finished my swimm meet and everyone else left but i stayed to practice more but the pool was alot colder than i remember but i ignored it because my body would get used to it. and after 5 minutes, i blacked out, but when i was out, i was back underwater but it wasnt the pool and i heard a voice saying that i would be at one with water and ice. i didnt understand it at first but when i woke up, i was on the stands but after i got up, some sort of sea serpent thing that was half ice slithered out of the pool, so i tried to fight it and i won but i got a fractured arm and a wounded knee with alot of cuts. after i won i blacked out again and i had a vision of a woman who told me our parents were banished and i had to find other people who had powers of the attributes to save the world from something but i had to leave home to do this."

you were suprised that your sister went through the same thing you did and told her what happened to you and that you already got the money and clothes for the both of you in the backpack you brought."wow, what a crazy day, we both got powers and we have to look for people to help us fight a threat we dont even know."
"yeah, well lets go say goodbye to our friends before we leave" you said with sadness and amy replied, "ok, we'll meet up back at the house at 6, ok?" "yeah" "ok, cya at 6"

you didnt have many friends so you visited the people you were closest to and those people were: stephenie, elonso, nick, and sheyanne.

your first stop was sheyanne: she usaully hangs out at dairy queen with her friends gossiping and she was still there. you and her weret really close but enouh to be friends and you told her that you were leaving but you didnt tell her why cause she wouldnt believe you and she gave you a hug boodbye then you left.
the next was elonso who was at the boling ally and you had the same conversation but instead of a hug, he gave you a fist bump and a high five.
the next was nick who was at the skate park and the same thing happened but he also gave you his favorite skate board to rember him by.
and finaly was stephenie who was probably at home so you went there but when you got there, her house was nearly destroyed, so you entered it and not one living thing was there and when you left, you noticed a note than was caught on broken pole at the corner of the wreck which read, "to anyone i know who finds this, im leaving possibly forever. i cant tell you why but i can tell you that i will miss you allot. goodbye. -love: stephenie" you looked at the note with sadness and hope, because you two would reunite one day.

after you said your goodbyes, you met back up at your house to find your sister there waiting. "done now?" she asked and you replied with a yes and told her about what you say at stephenie's house and that she most likely got powers too. "wow. so your crush got powers too, huh? well we gotta go now, so where too?"




and so you 2 went to the airport and set off to _________ to start your journey.

1111122.content:
it was a long and painful flight to china. while you were on the plane, you had to sit next to a man that seemed like a sumo wrestler while your sister sat next to two europians the whole way. not only that, but because you two didnt get full control of your powers, you two nearly belw up the plane, flooded the bathroom, gave extreme trouble with the get engines, and in one case: gave a man snot-sickles. after the first 5 hours, the speaker said "attention passengers. this is your captain speaking. do to most problems we've had so far, we somehow managed to arrive to china 40 minutes ahead of schedule." you and your sister sighed and nearly spoke in unison the same thing: "finally."

when arriving at the bejieng airport, you two called a cab that took you to your hotel. it was the hashimoto peace sanctuary. when arriving at the front desk, you do sharaids to tell the front desk lady that you would like a double sweet. when you two left the lobby, the women muttered something in chinese that translated to "these americans get dumber and dumber every year."

"so, where should we start looking?" sam asked you, "i dont know, but maybe we should look for the most natural parts of china, like: dark caves, zen gardens, and areas around mountains." you reply with some hoplesness. so to get some area ideas, you turn on the tv and the first thing that came up was the news, and the story was that wind activity increased in the past 2 days, but the most activity was near the tallest point of the great wall. "perfect, now we know what attribute is hear and we know where to look. and the best part is that the great wall is only 2 hours from here."

so you two took anoother cab up to the tourist entrance to the great wall. the walk up was pretty hard for you because the only non obese leading thing about you is that you have a very high metablolism but it was eay for your sister because she swam for 4 years. after the first hour, she made some sly comments about you needing to stop every 20 minutes. but eventually, you managed to get to the sumit of the wall.

"so, this is where the wind guys is supposed to be. but i dont see him" you noticed that too but you suddenly heard a loud gong to your right and when you turn your head, you see a large, green monistary with the chinese symbol for wind on it. "hey, sam, do you see what im seeing" you ask her, but when she looks at the same place as you, she dosnt see anything and replies with a no. you guide her to where you see the monistary but she still dosnt see or feel it.

"ok, i dont know why you can't see it, but im going inside." you tell her but she grabs your arm and says, "look bro, i think that fire you got is messing with your head. there is nothing here. and even if there is, then do you even know what is inside it?" this suprised you but you released yourself from her grip and told her that you're going inside.

when you got inside the monistary, there was a strong gust of wind that slammed the doors shut and when looking around, you see that at the other end, there was a teenage girl around your age and she seemed to be in lotus position while starring at you. she had a look of anger and suspicion on her face, then she said, "who are you and how did you get in here?" you looked just as confused as she was and then replied with, "im mike and i was told that i had to find people with similar powers to mine and i was lead to this spot. i was given the power of fire. i came here with my sister who has the power of water but for some reason, i could see this place and she couldn't, so i came in here and here you are. and now i have a question, who are you?"

she seemed angier and answered, "my name is natalie, i came here with my family 2 years ago and yesterday, i got these weird powers and i was brought to this temple and i was told to find otheres with powers like ours. but i will __________"

1113321.content: Mike wakes up with a start. His 13 year old body is covered in an icy sweat. Meh nightmare that he had just experienced was like nothing he had ever felt before. He couldn't remember much, but he had the vague impression of a teenage girl wrapped in the whitest light holding off a huge cloud of inky darkness. He had no idea who the girl was, or what he and her were doing there, but he remembered her looking at him with her pretty gray eyes and saying "this is not your fight child of earth, time to wake up" and then he was awake. He flipped aside the covers and set his feet on the hard wood floor. He didn't notice, but the dust on the floor instead of flying off in all directions, seemed to cling to his feet as though attracted by a magnet. I wonder what that dream was about... he thought as he got out of bed.
1113321.title: earth!

11133211.content:
You finish getting dressed and step out of your bedroom into the hallway. As you do, a delicious aroma fills the air. Sweet! Mom made pancakes! you think to yourself as you dash downstairs, all thoughts of nightmares forgotten.

You enter the family dining room and see your dad already sitting at the table typing away at his work laptop, mom was standing over the stove cooking up some of her world famous chocolate chip pancakes. It smelt even better down here than it had upstairs in the hallway! " happy birthday Mike" she said excitedly as she nonchalantly flipped the pancakes into the air. "Ready for some delicious breakfast?" A huge smile crosses your face. You had completely forgotten about your fourteenth birthday today! You run a hand through your dark brown hair as you plop down at the table. "am I ever!" You answer excitedly. Mom heaps several pancakes already drizzled with maple syrup on a plate in front of you. The best part about being the only child? You never had to share your pancakes. "I have a gift for you son" Dad said reaching below the table. He lifts up a small intricately carved wooden box. There was an odd hexagram on the lid of it. It was odd because there were six circles connected by lines, each having its own weird symbol within the circles. But one circle was about twice the size of the others. The symbol within it was a flat horizontal line wit two smaller lines branching out of it and two more small lines branching off those. "Cool!" Said mike as he pried the lid off. Inside the box was a silver ring. The ring had the same symbol as the over large circle on the lid of the box. But Mike hadn't even noticed that. As soon as he laid eyes upon the ring, he knew he was meant to wear it. Rings weren't even his style! There was something about it, something inside him, that absolutely needed to wear this ring.
